io.jeo.data

Class FileDriver<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.jeo.data.FileDriver<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Driver<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Directory, FileVectorDriver, Gbf, GDAL, MBTiles

    public abstract class FileDriver<T>
extends Object
implements Driver<T>
    Base class for file based drivers.
    Author:
    Justin Deoliveira, OpenGeo

    • Method Detail

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled(Messages messages)
        Description copied from interface: Driver
        Determines if the driver is enabled.

        The messages argument is optionally used for the driver to report back any messages or exceptions that prevent the driver from being enabled.

        Specified by:
        isEnabled in interface Driver<T>

      • aliases

        public List<String> aliases()
        Description copied from interface: Driver
        Secondary names identifying the driver.

        Aliases are typically shorter abbreviations for Driver.name()

        Specified by:
        aliases in interface Driver<T>

      • keys

        public List<Key<?>> keys()
        Description copied from interface: Driver
        Returns the keys supported by the driver.
        Specified by:

      • family

        public String family()
        Description copied from interface: Driver
        The family of the driver.

        This value is used to group drivers based on implementation. For example this value would indicate if the driver is based on another library that provides geo format support (GDAL, GeoTools, etc...)

        Specified by:
        family in interface Driver<T>

      • canOpen

        public boolean canOpen(Map<?,Object> opts,
              Messages msgs)
        Checks for the existence of the FILE key and calls through to canOpen(File, Map, Messages)
        Specified by:
        canOpen in interface Driver<T>
        Parameters:
        opts - Options describing the data.
        msgs - Messages reported from the driver, optionally null.
        Returns:
        True if the driver can open the data, otherwise false.

      • canOpen

        protected boolean canOpen(File file,
              Map<?,Object> opts,
              Messages msgs)
        Same semantics as Driver.canOpen(Map, Messages), and supplies the file to open.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to open.
        opts - The original driver options.
        msgs - Messages to report back.

      • open

        public final T open(Map<?,Object> opts)
             throws IOException
        Parses the FILE key and calls through to open(File, Map).
        Specified by:
        open in interface Driver<T>
        Parameters:
        opts - Options describing the data to connect to.
        Returns:
        The data.
        Throws:
        IOException - In the event of a connection error such as a file system error or database connection failure.

      • open

        protected abstract T open(File file,
     Map<?,Object> opts)
                   throws IOException
        Same semantics as Driver.open(Map), and supplies the file to open.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to open.
        opts - The original driver options.
